lines.text: I want to destroy him in his father's eyes!
It's your hatred that has caused this death.
There isn't a twenty-dollar bill in Miami that doesn't have a little coke on it.
I should have known - never work with Jews.
I'm gonna give you three days, but if you don't bring me the coke, I'll hand you your son's head in a plastic garbage bag.
God's clock isn't set like ours is.
Thank you Maurice, you forgot to invite me but I'll stay anyways.
To all those who left us may they die twice!
Pasco, your the one who is going to die, in spite of all your guards.
I'm Gonna Die? We gotta scoop here, whos gonna kill me you?
Amigo, I've looked death in the face a dozen times. Didn't look like you.
Eli, it looks you put on weight.
Oh well, it looks like it.
